Class OutDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices.OutDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFrequency, IDevice, IOutDevice, IOutDeviceEx

    public class OutDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOutDeviceEx
    Output Device which needs to be configured to implement the following flow: sensor =) scaler =) control =) IPwmOut. (e.g.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
